name: The Only KB Workout You Need (@Asgooch)
description: If you're just looking to get in great shape, this is it. Single kettlebell, ~35 min, repeatable multiple times a week. Swings, clean-to-squats, chest press, and Turkish get-ups. Easy to progress — just add weight or reps.

exercises.notes: Two-handed. Explosive hips, control the descent.
Clean to rack, squat, stand. Repeat.
Lie down, press from chest. Elbows at 45 degrees.
Slow and controlled. This is practice, not a race.

tips: Hit this multiple times per week for general fitness
Progress by adding weight or reps each week
Turkish get-ups are separate skill work — take your time with them
